hero.headline: Every Tree Tells a Story
hero.subheadline: Kazakhstan's first transparent platform for monitoring urban green spaces

noTransparency.title: No Transparency
noTransparency.description: Current tree monitoring systems operate as black boxes. Citizens have no way to verify if trees are actually planted or maintained. The lack of transparent data leads to distrust and makes it impossible to hold anyone accountable for failures.

noAccountability.title: No Accountability
noAccountability.description: Without clear tracking and reporting, there is no way to identify who is responsible when things go wrong. Money disappears into inefficient processes, and no one takes ownership of the outcomes or environmental impact.

noAccess.title: No Access
noAccess.description: Critical environmental data is locked away in outdated systems. Researchers, urban planners, and concerned citizens cannot access the information they need to make informed decisions about their communities and environment.

interactiveMap.title: Interactive Map
interactiveMap.description: Explore every tree in Kazakhstan with our intuitive mapping system

advancedFilters.title: Advanced Filters
advancedFilters.description: Find exactly what you need with powerful search and filtering

liveStatistics.title: Live Statistics
liveStatistics.description: Real-time data and analytics at your fingertips

easyUpload.title: Easy Upload
easyUpload.description: Simple CSV import for bulk tree data entry

photoDocumentation.title: Photo Documentation
photoDocumentation.description: Visual proof for every tree planted and maintained

exportReports.title: Export Reports
exportReports.description: Generate comprehensive reports in multiple formats

treesPlanted.title: Trees Get Planted
treesPlanted.description: Our team plants trees across Kazakhstan, carefully selecting native species suited to each location's climate and soil conditions.

mappedRealtime.title: Mapped in Real-Time
mappedRealtime.description: Each tree is instantly recorded with GPS coordinates, photos, and detailed metadata for complete transparency and traceability.

monitorGrow.title: Monitor & Grow
monitorGrow.description: Track growth progress, health status, and environmental impact through our interactive dashboard with real-time updates.

passwordRequirements.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
passwordRequirements.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
passwordRequirements.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
passwordRequirements.number: Password must contain at least one number

auth.roleDescription: Select your account role. Admin roles require approval.

admin.manageUserAccounts: Manage user accounts, roles, and permissions

footer.tagline: Restoring Kazakhstan's Green Future, One Tree at a Time

about.heading: About Treecovery
about.tagline: Restoring Kazakhstan's Green Future, One Tree at a Time
about.missionDescription: Treecovery is Kazakhstan's first transparent platform for monitoring urban green spaces. We believe that environmental data should be accessible, verifiable, and actionable for everyone.
about.visionDescription: A Kazakhstan where every tree planted is tracked, every green space is monitored, and every citizen can verify the environmental impact of urban greening initiatives.
about.transparencyDesc: All data is open and verifiable
about.accountabilityDesc: Clear tracking of who does what

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.subheading: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.getInTouchDescription: Whether you have questions about Treecovery, want to contribute data, or need technical support, we're here to help. Reach out through any of the channels below.
contact.responseTimeDescription: We typically respond within 24-48 hours. For urgent matters, please use email.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.thankYou: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.
contact.sendFailed: Failed to send message. Please try again later.
contact.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
contact.subjectMinLength: Subject must be at least 3 characters
contact.messageMinLength: Message must be at least 10 characters

impactStats.heading: Our Impact in Numbers
impactStats.tagline: Join thousands of users tracking millions of trees across Kazakhstan

testimonials.heading: Trusted by Government Officials
testimonials.subheading: See what leaders across Kazakhstan are saying about Treecovery

adminSection.heading: Built for Administrators
adminSection.description: Powerful tools designed to streamline tree management, from bulk uploads to comprehensive reporting. Everything you need to efficiently track and manage large-scale planting initiatives.

newsletter.heading: Stay Updated with Treecovery
newsletter.subheading: Get the latest news about tree planting initiatives, platform updates, and environmental impact reports.

newsletter.privacy: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe at any time.
